title: Yugioh Egyptian God cards
description:
The Yugioh Egyptian God cards first appeared in the Battle City arc of the Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters anime, where they had a thunderous impact on the duelling arena. In the collectible card game, they’re extremely powerful – if flawed – monsters. They’re not the most expensive Yugioh cards, and they’re not powerful enough to appear on … Continued

title: Quinns’ weird new RPG channel wants to “distract people from DnD”
description:
There’s a weird and wonderful new tabletop RPG channel on the YouTube block – Quinns Quest. This is the brainchild of Quinns (Quintin Smith, of Shut Up & Sit Down and People Make Games fame), and it wants to introduce a diverse range of RPGs to its hobbyist audience. But with this mission comes another … Continued

title: The best DnD backgrounds in 5e
description:
Choosing a DnD background is a core part of character creation. After picking a class, race, and ability scores, you'll use a 5e background to decide who your Dungeons and Dragons character is, where they're from, and what they've done. Below you'll find a list of all the backgrounds 5e offers - as well as detailed profiles and tips on some of our favorite backgrounds.

Continue reading The best DnD backgrounds in 5e

title: New Warhammer 40k Tau Empire mini rides an alien cat-lizard
description:
Games Workshop has revealed another new Warhammer 40k T’au Empire miniature, the Kroot Lone-Spear, via the Warhammer Community website. This scouting loner rides a creature called a Kalamandras, a lizard-like beast with chameleonic skin. This is the latest of several T’au Empire reveals for Warhammer 40k, following on from the Kroot Hunting Pack box set and … Continued

title: The top 10 MTG cats in Magic: The Gathering
description:
MTG Cats may be adorable, but they have far more to offer than precious whiskers and fluffy paws. A Magic: The Gathering deck stuffed with Cats can dominate in a range of format, spawning tokens and buffing life left and right. title: Massive Warhammer 40k Tyranid float invades Spanish carnival
description:
On Saturday February 10, two five-meter tall Warhammer 40k Tyranid monsters rampaged through the Carnaval de Terra Endins in the tiny town of Torelló near Barcelona, Spain. The enormous carnival float was the work of a local community group, ‘Els Grillats’, whose members overlap with a local wargaming society. Wargamer owes thanks to Warhammer 40k … Continued

title: Get every book from one of the funniest RPGs ever for under $20
description:
Publisher Mongoose Publishing is selling all 32 rulebooks, expansions, and mission packs, from the 2005 and 2009 editions of Paranoia, in an $18 Humble Bundle.
